toolset_description:
Havok Toolset

Havok Toolset is a collection of conversion tools under HavokLib.

This toolset runs on Spike foundation.

Head to this Wiki for more information on how to effectively use it.

Latest Release

## Release authenticity Every release asset will contain corresponding `.sig` file, together with [Sign Key](sign_key.asc) can be used to verify asset via gpg. Simple usage: ```bash gpg --import sign_key.asc # Required only once gpg --verify .sig ```
hk_to_gltf:
Converts Havok data into GLTF.
Supports animation and skeleton data.
